body_html:
I feel like something might have been done here 78b8be6, but I am not sure...

EDIT: I think this doesn't solve it, actually. It seems it just uses Unix path names, but does not prepend with \\?\. You would need to do both for my fix to work.
body_text:
I feel like something might have been done here 78b8be6, but I am not sure...
EDIT: I think this doesn't solve it, actually. It seems it just uses Unix path names, but does not prepend with \\?\. You would need to do both for my fix to work.
body:
I feel like something might have been done here [78b8be6](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/commit/78b8be6486d4cd0e1515e5cc19b865671e01c743), but I am not sure...

EDIT: I think this doesn't solve it, actually. It seems it just uses Unix path names, but does not prepend with \\\\?\\. You would need to do both for my fix to work.
